text: Titia moi ekta Mer laga bacha ke dikhise, jun singhason laga majot khara hoi kene thakise aru charta janwar khan majot khara thakise aru bura manu khan majote khara thakise, Taike morai diya nisena dikhise. Tai laga sat-ta seing aru sat-ta suku thakise, juntu Isor laga sat-ta atma khan thakise, kunkhan ke prithibi laga sob jagate pathai dise5.6 Zec. 4:10..
